Reviews.Title: great phone , i LOVE it
Reviews.Author: shlomi
Reviews.Content: i have this phone for a week now , and still can't stop messing with it :)small screen ? the image is so sharp you just forget its small .the design is beautiful the phone is light and thin , sits perfect in my pocket .as for performance , super fast and responsive , great camera and easy to get used to .i just wanted a small smartphone and i got so much more !1 issue - this model works worldwide but you cant get 3g network from US carriers (at&t; - T-mobile). voice , text and 2g network , works perfect . if you use wifi internet and don't care about mobile network go for it , if u DO want 3g , you will have to buy the ST18a model , that can get 3g from at&t; .

Reviews.Title: Great phone!
Reviews.Author: Cyrual
Reviews.Content: This phone does what I want when I want. It's only limit is the network. I downloaded Skype for Android yesterday and made a few video calls, finally making use of the front camera. I'm pleased with it overall.

Reviews.Title: Almost Perfect
Reviews.Author: Kayjenx "Kayla"
Reviews.Content: Everything about this phone is great. I bought it knowing it would upgrade to ICS Android 4 and it did so and works great. The screen is so bright that it drains the battery pretty fast so what I do it lower it so that the battery life is extended. The screen is still very vivid but phone battery last me for 3 days with normal phone use and not much internet usage.Its very easy to set up and use and I would recommend to some with very small hands. My hands are on the smaller side and I can't even use the qwerty keyboard in portrait mode. So then I am stuck using it in landscape mode, and T9 with phone pad in portrait. But really that's my only complaint.I use the hotspot option from time to time and it really takes a toll on the battery but I suppose that is to be expected.Oh! come to think of it I have a couple weird things that happen at random times but I am not sure why. One is that I would be replying to a message and then when I look at my screen there is nothing typing. I would have to come out and the message and then return and it would work.The other things is about 5 times since I got the phone in March, it has told me that I need to insert a sim card when I already had in a sim card. Restarting my phone is the only way to fix this. But as it doesn't happen often I don't consider it a big deal. However when it does happen it is very annoying.

Reviews.Title: Love sony ericsson

Reviews.Content: The camera is great. The sony ericsson menu is great. It's light and beautiful.I've been using this phone for almost 3 years now, dropped it several times but it's still working perfectly!
